message.finalize_message:
Do you want to finish this class?

Attendances will be counted on the catechism sheets and it will not be possible to edit the class.
message.passing_grade_message:
Do you want to pass the year without ending this class?

This class will remain editable and the attendance will not be counted on the catechism sheets until it is finished.
message.passing_grade_finalize_message:
Do you want to finish this class at the end of the year?

This class will be finished and a new window will be opened so that you can create the new class.
The attendance of this class will be counted on the catechism sheets and it will no longer be possible to edit it.
